  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1249</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Yom Kippur Davening: A Discussion Guide1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Yom Kippur Davening: Eine Diskussion Guide1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Yom Kippur Davening : Une Discussion Guide1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Yom Kippur Davening: Uma Discussão Guide1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Yom Kippur Davening: Una Discussione Guide1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Yom Kippur Davening: Μια συζήτηση 
Guide1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Yom Kippur Davening: Una Discusión Guide1</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Moshe Goodman's guide explores common feelings that are felt by children (and adults) during Yom Kippur davening in an open and non-judgmental way. Feelings include: boredom, confidence, guilt, happiness, nervousness, and sadness.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Yom Kippur davening</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">feelings</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">the lookstein center</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anleitung des Moshe Goodmans erforscht geläufige 
Gefühle, die von den Kindern (und von den Erwachsenen) während Yom 
Kippur geglaubt werden, das in einer geöffneten und 
nicht-non-judgmental Methode davening ist. Gefühle schließen 
ein: Langeweile, Vertrauen, Schuld, Glück, Nervosität und 
Traurigkeit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le guide du goodman's de Moshe explore les 
sentiments communs qui sont sentis par des enfants (et des adultes) 
pendant le Yom Kippur davening d'une voie ouverte et non-de jugement. 
Les sentiments incluent : ennui, confiance, culpabilité, 
bonheur, énervement, et tristesse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A guia do dono da casa de Moshe explora os 
sentimentos comuns que são sentidos por crianças (e por adultos) 
durante Yom Kippur que davening em uma maneira aberta e 
non-non-judgmental. Os sentimentos incluem: boredom, 
confiança, culpa, felicidade, nervousness, e sadness.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La guida del goodman di Moshe esplora le 
sensibilità comuni che sono ritenute dai bambini (e dagli adulti) 
durante il Yom Kippur che davening in un modo aperto e non-di 
giudizio. Le sensibilità includono: noia, riservatezza, 
guilt, felicità, nervosismo e tristezza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο οδηγός Goodman Moshe ερευνά τα κοινά 
συναισθήματα που γίνονται αισθητά από τα παιδιά (και τους 
ενηλίκους) κατά τη διάρκεια Yom Kippur με έναν ανοικτό και 
μη-ιuδγμενταλ τρόπο. Τα συναισθήματα περιλαμβάνουν: 
πλήξη, εμπιστοσύνη, ενοχή, ευτυχία, νευρικότητα, και 
θλίψη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La guía del goodman de Moshe explora las 
sensaciones comunes que son sentidas por los niños (y los adultos) 
durante Yom Kippur davening de una manera abierta y no-cri'tica. 
Las sensaciones incluyen: aburrimiento, confianza, 
culpabilidad, felicidad, nerviosismo, y tristeza.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Yom davening Kippur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gefühle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die lookstein Mitte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plan de leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Yom Kippur davening</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sentiments</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le centre de lookstein</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planta da lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Yom Kippur que davening</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sentimentos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o centro do lookstein</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
